name: Vladmir's Offering
lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

descriptions.name: Vladmir's Aura
descriptions.description: Grants lifesteal (15% for melee heroes, 10% for ranged), 3 health regeneration, 0.8 mana regeneration, 15% bonus attack damage, and 4 armor to nearby allies. Radius: 900
